summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 9, 2019. It records the official inmate count and roster for the facility, including specific housing unit tallies and inmate assignments, with several inmates flagged for suicide watch.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Official inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, recording a total of 758 inmates across various housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is an official Bureau of Prisons count sheet dated August 9, 2019.
The Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York housed 758 inmates at the time of this count.
The inmate roster shows several inmates (with registration numbers 89673-053, 86272-054, 91349-053, 85377-054) were on suicide watch or suicide observation status.
The document includes detailed housing unit breakdowns with counts for units B-A, C-A, E-N, E-S, G-N, G-S, H-A, I-N, K-N, K-S, R-A, Z-A, and Z-B.
This administrative document shows routine prison operations at the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.
